quest.name: A Pachyderm's Promptitude
journal:
Trna's eyes are sparkling with optimism, but the baleful look Maru shoots you from afar tells a different story.
※The difficulty of this quest will be synced to your current level.

Trna is energetic with news of the Hippo Riders' progress, but Maru, one of her associates, voices an uneasy prediction: due to the hippo carts' limited storage capacity, it will be only a matter of time before bigger competition sweeps them out of business. Not to be deterred, Trna starts considering what niche service the Hippo Riders might offer, but arrives at no clear answer. You agree to meet her at the Great Work in the hopes that her clientele may offer more inspiration.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
You reach the Great Work, but Trna, due to arrive before you, is nowhere to be found. Worried for her safety, you decide to search the area.
You find Trna fending off a raging vajralangula and dispatch the beast without a second thought. Behind her, an alchemist nurses his injuries, so you kneel to administer what succor you can.

According to the alchemist, it was a gift of ripe fruit that drew the attention of the vajralangula, and Trna was his unexpected savior. Awkwardly accepting his praise, Trna decides to see the alchemist and his luggage safely into the Great Work before rendezvousing with you to pick up the original delivery.
Due to an unfortunate and explosive incident, the package is still being prepared. Trna suggests asking around the Great Work for niche business ideas in the meantime.

Serving as moral support for a trepidatious Trna, you begin your turn around the Great Work. As ever, conversation with the alchemists is bound to be...interesting.

※You must be accompanied by Trna to complete this task. Speak with her again should you become separated.

While undoubtedly colorful, the alchemists' accounts of their recent affairs fall short of delineating an eligible service plan. Regardless, it is time to check back with your customer and see if the package is ready.

The package, it turns out, is destined for none other than Yezahn─doubtless far too occupied with parenting to procure needed tinctures himself. As you prepare to depart the Great Work, Trna is struck by an idea to assist busy alchemists, but she puts the thought on hold as you set off to Palaka's Stand to reunite with an old acquaintance.

Upon Yezahn's grateful receipt of the package, Trna senses an opportunity to propose a new hippo-based service─food delivery. Yezahn assures her that such a service would be an attractive option to not only those at the Great Work, but Palaka's Stand as well, given the recently interrupted tradition of bringing fresh meals to those working in the jungle. Buoyed by his encouragement, Trna returns to Svarna in high spirits.

Trna shares her plan to offer food delivery by hippo cart, thereby solidifying the Hippo Riders' commitment to offering a niche service to the island. To this, Maru enthusiastically suggests installing a kitchen in Svarna, that the meals they deliver might be freshly made. Striking at the fastest way to anyone's heart─the stomach─the Hippo Riders gear up for the delicious deliveries that await!
objectives: Rendezvous with Trna at the Great Work.
Speak with Trna and have her accompany you.
Question the alchemists of the Great Work while accompanied by Trna.
Speak with the flustered alchemist while accompanied by Trna.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Forename! Here to see how we're gettin' along, are you? Let me go an' grab Maru.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Thanks to your help and Kancana's odd jobs, we've been keepin' our carts rollin' and stayin' outta trouble.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Communicatin' with the locals still feels dauntin' at times, but Maru here's made us some gulal to break the ice!

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Er, maybe you don't know what I'm talkin' about─gulal is this bright, colored powder used in some of Thavnair's religious traditions.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: There's an old belief that you'll be blessed with good luck an' spared from evil if a visitor sprinkles you with a healthy handful. It's enough to make even the most stubborn buggers happy to welcome us.

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Sisters know it's been nothin' but bad business for everyone, lately. I reckon a little extra luck would do us all good...

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: That it would. Though our own luck might be better if my girl Saurya didn't start gallopin' with glee when she gets so much as a glimpse of the stuff...

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: But all in all, we've been gettin' our name out there an' learnin' the job. Might be slow goin', but we're makin' good progress.

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: But Boss... Is slow goin' really gonna cut it? So long's I get to ride, I ain't got no problems, but...

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Our carts ain't exactly designed for haulin' cargo. No one beats us for speed, but practically speakin'...

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Sooner or later, some silver-tongued dab hand's gonna come along with carriages or boats that can carry loads an' loads of packages. An' then where will we be? Outta work, that's where...

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Our carts might not best a carriage in freight, but it's like you said, Maru─at speed, we're unbeatable.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: If only there was some way to make the most of it... To offer a service that no one else could do better...

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Ask not and ye shall receive no answer...

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Don't look at me. Maybe your customers will have some ideas.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: True. We won't get anywhere marinatin' in our own juices. Let's ask around an' see what speedy services folks might need.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: ...Is what I'd say if I knew the first thing about makin' small talk. Which I don't. Help me out?

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Let's start at the Great Work─I got a delivery request from an alchemist there, so me an' Saurya'll head over first.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: I'll meet you by the aetheryte after I've picked up the goods.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You wait by the aetheryte, but see no sign of Trna, who should have arrived before you. Has trouble befallen her...?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Perhaps you should search the area for any wayward hippos.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: What the─ Y-You're amazin'! You put down that beast like it was nothin'!

dialogue.name: ALCHEMIST04546A
dialogue.text: Th-Thank you! Oh, thank you!

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: You really saved our skins, Forename! Me an' Saurya zipped over when we heard yelpin', but it was everythin' I could do to just keep that beast at bay...

dialogue.name: ALCHEMIST04546A
dialogue.text: And I don't know what would have become of me if you hadn't! Allow me to express my sincerest gratitude.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: A-Anyway, am I imaginin' things or does it smell like fruit around here? If I was a vajralangula, I'd come runnin' too.

dialogue.name: ALCHEMIST04546A
dialogue.text: You've a sharp nose, miss. Yes, I was in Yedlihmad on an errand when a merchant bade me take this fruit, insisting it was delicious and perfectly ripe.

dialogue.name: ALCHEMIST04546A
dialogue.text: How was I to know that every beast in Saltwind's Welcome should agree with his claims wholeheartedly? I thought escaping that herd of drooling gaja would be the worst of it, but my hopes were fruitless, as it were.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Well, the next time you've got somethin' to haul, call the Hippo Riders. Me an' my associates do fast, safe deliveries by hippo cart.

dialogue.name: ALCHEMIST04546A
dialogue.text: Yes, I've heard talk of hippo couriers as of late! Never did I imagine one would come speeding to my rescue. I will absolutely call upon your services in the future.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: I'm gonna load his fruit onto the cart an' see him into town.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: I've still gotta pick up that package, so come find me inside the Great Work. This time for sure!

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Here's our customer. Let's pick up the goods and get goin'.

dialogue.name: ALCHEMIST04546B
dialogue.text: Aaah! You're the couriers, aren't you? You're here! You're already here!

dialogue.name: ALCHEMIST04546B
dialogue.text: Huh? But you're with the Students of Baldesion, aren't you? What business have you with our parcel!?

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: I dunno about any Bal...bald students or nothin', but Forename's helpin' out with our new delivery service.

dialogue.name: ALCHEMIST04546B
dialogue.text: Really? Supporting small businesses, how grand!

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: So, er... Can I have the goods now?

dialogue.name: ALCHEMIST04546B
dialogue.text: Ack! W-Well, you see... Th-That is to say... It's not quite ready yet!

dialogue.name: ALCHEMIST04546B
dialogue.text: I overslept, is the thing─just a tiny little bit─so I was rushing to get it all prepared. And that's when I made this truly minuscule error in the formula and it...well, it exploded. Quite explosively.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: E-Exploded? That's, er... My condolences. In that case, I'll just hang around here while you're gettin' it ready. ...No rush.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Let's go an' do the talkin' thing while we wait. See what our potential customers need most right now.

dialogue.name: ALCHEMIST04546B
dialogue.text: My colleagues unceremoniously ejected me from the laboratory, but they are hard at work getting the shipment together, I promise you!

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Alright! Conversations, here we come.

dialogue.name: ALCHEMIST04546C
dialogue.text: Woooooo! Burn, baby, burn!

dialogue.name: ALCHEMIST04546C
dialogue.text: What's this, what's this!? Do I need this, that, or the other!? No, no, no! I'm flying free and feeling fine!

dialogue.name: ALCHEMIST04546C
dialogue.text: I finished all my assigned work, which means I now have three delicious days for my personal research. I'll eat and sleep when I'm dead, but until then─ALCHEMY!

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Er... Right, then. Congratulations?

dialogue.name: ALCHEMIST04546D
dialogue.text: Ughhh... It's never-ending...

dialogue.name: ALCHEMIST04546D
dialogue.text: Do I need anything? Well...the Radiant Host used up its entire stock of medicinal supplies during the Final Days, so requests for replenishment keep pouring in without end.

dialogue.name: ALCHEMIST04546D
dialogue.text: I can't remember the last time I sat down for dinner with my family. It seems like a different lifetime by now...

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: That's, er, unfortunate. I wish I could help, but I dunno the first thing about medicine...

dialogue.name: ALCHEMIST04546E
dialogue.text: To eat! To sleep! Perchance to lick...?

dialogue.name: ALCHEMIST04546E
dialogue.text: Do I need something? Why, I'm glad you asked─I've depleted my stores of honey!

dialogue.name: ALCHEMIST04546E
dialogue.text: I haven't a moment to spare for such trivial affairs as eating, but cognitive functioning dramatically decreases without regular sustenance, so I came up with a brilliant scheme─lick honey throughout the day for quick and easy nourishment. Only now there's none to be had, as I've licked it all up!

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: We could start beekeepin', I guess? “Honey Honey Hippos” does have a ring to it... Then again, I'm not sure how many people'd use a high-speed honey service...

dialogue.name: ALCHEMIST04546C
dialogue.text: There are so many formulae to try! What if I just try them all...at the same time!?

dialogue.name: ALCHEMIST04546D
dialogue.text: I hope I can eat dinner with my family again someday. While I still have a family, that is...

dialogue.name: ALCHEMIST04546E
dialogue.text: I suppose I'll have to order more honey... Or perhaps invent a comparable substance to lick!

dialogue.name: ALCHEMIST04546B
dialogue.text: I am ever so sorry to have kept you waiting! It's all here, packed up safely and hardly singed at all.

dialogue.name: ALCHEMIST04546B
dialogue.text: I would like you to take this to a colleague of mine at Palaka's Stand. He's an alchemist named Yezahn. Well built for a bookish type. Handsome. You can't miss him.

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Him! With the baby!

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Ah, I know Yezahn.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: That name sounds familiar...

dialogue.name: ALCHEMIST04546B
dialogue.text: Oh, you're acquainted, are you? What a small world indeed!

dialogue.name: ALCHEMIST04546B
dialogue.text: He's still the same as ever, watching over his little one and Palaka's Stand alike. He requested replenishments for medicinal supplies, so hopefully this should tide them over.

dialogue.name: ALCHEMIST04546B
dialogue.text: I also threw in a handful of finished samples...and the whole explosion incident stays between us, yes!?

dialogue.name: ALCHEMIST04546B
dialogue.text: Now if you'll excuse me, I should eat something before my hands start shaking again. Oh, but do give him my regards!

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: These alchemists don't seem to stop for nothin'─even meals. Ain't no denyin' that their work's important, but it's a miracle they haven't all keeled over by now...

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Hmm... What if the vittles came to them?

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: ...But I'm gettin' ahead of myself. This package ain't gonna ride to Palaka's Stand on its lonesome. Introduce me to this Yezahn when we get there, will you?

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Is this Yezahn? He is pretty sturdy lookin'...

dialogue.name: YEZAHN
dialogue.text: Forename, what a pleasant surprise! I knew a shipment would be arriving soon, but I never expected you to be with it.

dialogue.name: YEZAHN
dialogue.text: Are you playing the part of carter these days, then?

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: The alchemist who sent this said it's herbs for medicine...an' somethin' about finished samples, too.

dialogue.name: YEZAHN
dialogue.text: Is that so? I know how busy the work keeps them─it's very generous of them to send ready concoctions.

dialogue.name: YEZAHN
dialogue.text: I wanted to get straight to work replenishing our medicinal stores, so your prompt arrival is welcome indeed.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Oh, if it's prompt you want, you ain't gotta look no further! The Hippo Riders'll deliver anythin' to anywhere in a flash!

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: 'Course, we're always fine-tunin' our carts an' services, so as to better, er, serve the area. Seein' as you're the one lookin' out for folks over here, I want to pitch you an idea.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: My impression is that folks over at the Great Work are so busy, they barely have time to eat. That can't be good for the alchemy─not to mention the alchemists─so I'm thinkin' we start deliverin' fresh food by hunger-harryin' hippo!

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Only, startin' a service for just a handful of peaky alchemists ain't exactly gonna pay the rent. You think folks here could use some grub-runners?

dialogue.name: YEZAHN
dialogue.text: I do believe so.

dialogue.name: YEZAHN
dialogue.text: It has long been tradition to send food to those working in the jungle, so I'm fairly certain you'll find our residents amenable to such a service.

dialogue.name: YEZAHN
dialogue.text: As these hot and humid climes tend to spoil foodstuffs easily, we like to deliver meals as soon as they are prepared.

dialogue.name: YEZAHN
dialogue.text: However, transporting victuals in this jungle can prove somewhat dangerous.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: You mean that the smell attracts all sorts of hungry critters, right?

dialogue.name: YEZAHN
dialogue.text: Precisely. And what with our fighting fit currently healing or engaged in other matters, we simply haven't the manpower to spare on escorting meals.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: ...But our hippos are a different story!

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: A hippo cart can outrun most anythin' in this jungle, so you ain't gotta worry on that front.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Thanks for weighin' in! I've gotta consult with my associates, but somethin' tells me you can look forward to fresh meals from now on. Call it a lunch hunch.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Alright, Forename. Let's head back to Svarna for a team meetin'.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: It was just as you said, Forename─askin' around earned us some bright ideas!

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: You think of somethin' good, Boss?

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Food, Maru! Eats! We're gonna deliver meals with these wheels!

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Eats!?

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Mouthwaterin' meals delivered wherever, whenever... Wish I could order somethin'.

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: We got it cinched, Boss! Ain't nothin' that'll deliver faster or fresher than our carts!

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text:
Hold your hippos, Maru─we've still gotta sort somethin' out. Where are we gettin' this food in the first place? Takin' meals from Palaka's Stand to the jungle is one thing, but if we've gotta ride all the way to Yedlihmad or
Radz-at-Han for ready-mades...

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Good point. Popular dishes'll be hard to keep in stock...

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: What if we had a kitchen here? We could make our own meals!

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Yeah... Fresh ingredients from merchants in Yedlihmad... The daily catch from fishers in Akyaali!

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: An' most importantly─we get an endless supply of food!

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: I might be a genius, Boss. Wait here, I'll have a kitchen goin' in no time!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Thanks to Maru's enthusiasm, Svarna has a new kitchen!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The Hippo Riders' reputation has risen to formerly delinquent carters. Make the most of their expanded services to help improve their social standing!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You have achieved Trusted reputation with the Hippo Riders.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: New Arkasodara tribal daily quests are now available from Maru in Svarna.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Furthermore, you will be able to undertake three additional quests from Maru as a reputation bonus. This bonus is available until the daily reset time for tribal quests.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: These additional quests will become available after accepting all current daily quests from Maru. Please be advised that you cannot undertake these quests if you have no remaining allowances.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You now have access to a wider selection of wares from Ghanta.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Trna is now accompanying you. Keep her at your side to proceed with quest objectives.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You can leave Trna behind by entering a different area, or by speaking with her and selecting the option to part ways.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: If you wish to have Trna accompany you again, return and speak with her at the original location.

dialogue.name: Q3
dialogue.text: What will you do?

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: Speak with Trna.

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: Part ways with Trna.

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: Nothing.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: The alchemists here are an odd bunch, eh? Includin' our latest customer. Kinda feels like I've stepped into another dimension or somethin'.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Alright, I think I've got a good sense of things. Let's head back an' see if the goods are ready.

dialogue.name: Q4
dialogue.text: Are you sure you wish to part ways with Trna?

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Somethin' came up? Well, when you're done, come find me by our customer.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: You're back! Let's get goin', then.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: The goods should be ready to go by now. Let's check in with our customer.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You must be accompanied by Trna and have her at your side in order to proceed with quest objectives.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Trna has yet to arrive. Be sure she is at your side before attempting to continue.
